import sys, os

# Check non-GUI imports

print\(''--- Checking LfpConfig from step_lfp ---''\)
from step_lfp import LfpConfig, BandEditorFrame
cfg = LfpConfig\(\)
print\(f''  OK: filter={cfg.filter_lowcut}-{cfg.filter_highcut}Hz, bands={list\(cfg.bands.keys\(\)\)}''\)

print\(''--- Checking lfp_pipeline import ---''\)
from lfp_pipeline import run_lfp_pipeline
print\(''  OK: run_lfp_pipeline imported''\)

print\(''--- Checking spike_sorting imports ---''\)
from spike_sorting import SortingConfig, ChannelSortResult, SpikeUnit
cfg2 = SortingConfig\(\)
print\(f''  OK: filter={cfg2.filter_low}-{cfg2.filter_high}Hz''\)

print\(''--- Checking phase_locking imports ---''\)
from phase_locking import analyze_spike_lfp_coupling, apply_fdr_to_phase_results
print\(''  OK''\)

print\(''--- Checking phase_plotting_v6 import ---''\)
from phase_plotting_v6 import plot_phase_grand_summary
print\(''  OK''\)

print\(''--- Checking spike_processing import ---''\)
from spike_processing import load_spike_data, UnitInfo
print\(''  OK''\)

print\(\)
print\(''=== All import checks passed ===''\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/wakel/anaconda3/python.exe" -c "
import numpy as np
print\(''numpy version:'', np.__version__\)
print\(''hasattr ptp:'', hasattr\(np.ndarray, ''ptp''\)\)
try:
    a = np.array\([1,2,3]\)
    print\(''ptp works:'', a.ptp\(\)\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(''ptp error:'', e\)
try:
    print\(''np.ptp exists:'', hasattr\(np, ''ptp''\)\)
except:
    pass
")
